text: I’d also make sure you aren’t calling a table multiple times in a for loop on accident. Before this limit was set in place I had pages structured this way which caused me hit the 10 limit. The fixes were easy though, I just had to change how/where I was looping :slightly_smiling_face:
the editor does not want me to even save that syntax. I removed the quotes around the limit=1 and it lets me save, but does not seem to get applied
Are you getting an error in the editor?

I am getting no error if I don’t put the limit=1 in quotes. However, if I put the limit=1 in quotes like I see in the docs, I get this error: <https://www.dropbox.com/s/uk1605l1xpxd2bx/Screenshot%202019-05-28%2016.53.35.png?dl=0>
That is saying that there is a syntax error because you have a `,` after the `limit=1`
thats super strange. I dont see any ‘,’ after my filter call
Can you DM me the template link?
according to the editor my syntax is wrong, but it looks just like the docs so I am a bit confused …
